entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers and flurries beginning this afternoon then changing to snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
